Edited Details are as follows:

{2}
PM: Kindly coordinate with ITS and provide them list of software which needs to be installed in the machine.

Admin: Kindly identify the seating arrangement and provide to ITS.

ITS: Kindly coordinate with PM and Admin and make the necessary arrangements.

After the appropriate arrangements have been completed please confirm the same via email to the HR Department.

Thanking you for your support.

In case of any difficulty kindly revert.

Regards,
{4}

Location.Name: Mumbai
Location.Subject: Resource allocation. [{0}{1}{2}Name:{3}]
Location.Body:
Dear {0},

You have been allocated to {1} {2} from {3}.

Your tenure in the project is deemed as complete only if there is explicit email notification from MRF system in similar lines with the current notification.

During the tenure of this assignment your line manager would be {4} for all your project related role/tasks and your timely availability for the same.

Your responsibilities for the defined role in the project are typically any/all of the following as per the requirements of the project:
{5}.

Your functional (practice/resource) manager during your tenure in Rave will be {6}.

Ensure that you take prior concurrence/approval/resolution support from both your reporting manager and project manager, whenever you take leave/permissions and anything contentious to your normal functioning in the project.

Feel free to revert for any queries regarding this allocation.

Wish you all the best in your new assignment.

Regards,
{7}
